hudson.tasks.Shell.command: mkdir -p /mnt/data/datasets/${DATASET_NAME}/gatein-data mkdir -p /mnt/data/datasets/${DATASET_NAME}/gatein-indexes/data/gatein/jcr mkdir -p /mnt/data/datasets/${DATASET_NAME}/ldap mkdir -p /mnt/data/datasets/${DATASET_NAME}/mysql mkdir -p /mnt/data/datasets/${DATASET_NAME}/sql-dump rm /mnt/data/datasets/DATASET-PLF-3.5.x-Intranet_LOT2 ln -s /mnt/data/datasets/${DATASET_NAME} /mnt/data/datasets/DATASET-PLF-3.5.x-Intranet_LOT2 cd /mnt/data/DS/PLF3.5.x/Intranet_LOT2_V02 time tar -cf /mnt/data/datasets/${DATASET_NAME}/gatein-data/data.tar data time cp -pr /mnt/data/DS/PLF3.5.x/Intranet_LOT2_V02/data/gatein/jcr/index /mnt/data/datasets/${DATASET_NAME}/gatein-indexes/data/gatein/jcr/index time rm -rf data.backup/ time cp -prf data data.backup
